Young grotworms are creatures found in the top level of the Grotworm Lair north-east of Rimmington near the White Knight Camp. They are the only monsters that drop coral bolts.

They have a very small range of aggression and will only attack players if they come right next to them, similar to living rock creatures. They attack with magic and melee, however, they only use magic when the player is out of melee range, and only use melee when the player is next to them.

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

Achievement[edit | edit source]

  • Guardian of the Realm ( 0) – Obtained a collection of unique drops from Slayer monsters located within Asgarnia & Misthalin.
    • Royal cape drop

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 19 August 2019 (Update):
    • Grotworms are able to damage the player once again.
  • hotfix 9 October 2017 (Update):
    • Members item drops on Young grotworms have been replaced with five bronze javelins, two trout or two anchovies.
  • update 22 May 2012 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Young grotworms used to be aggressive to all players regardless of combat level, similar to monsters in the Wilderness. This was changed with the Evolution of Combat.
